subject: United States International Relations
Olympic Games (2014)
Discrimination
Homosexuality
lead_paragraph: The president sent a protest of Russia’s crackdown on gay rights by designating delegations to the Olympics that include openly gay athletes but none of the nation’s top political figures.
snippet: The president sent a protest of Russia’s crackdown on gay rights by designating delegations to the Olympics that include openly gay athletes but none of the nation’s top political figures.
